title: 'Very very flimsy and cheap quality !!!!'
body: These are a total waste of money . I bought these since they have American Tourister brand backing but I have to say I was shocked at how flimsy and poor quality these are . I bought two since I had to travel overseas - to my horror the zip of one suitcase just have way at the airport only !!! And no they were not overweight or over stuffed - each suitcase weighed 13 kg each - I really wish I had not trusted the brand name - others if you are reading this dint waste your money on this one - it's cheap and poor quality -

title: 'You get what u pay for'
body: The case isn't as durable as it looks or should be. With even modest handling that you d expect in international air travels, the case bends out of shape easily and looks like something from of a garage sale.  Would rather visit a shop and pay a wee extra for a more sturdy one that can better withstand international transit handling.

title: 'Light weight and survived my first trip'
body: 'The suitcase might feel flimsy but it survived my 20hr flight. Pleasantly surprised. the inner part of the suitcase has very little padding and handle sticks out so if you place anything fragile that rests on the handle inside the suitcase it could potentially get damaged.'
